transcript:
Customer: [inaudible]

Executive: Hello?
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Ji sir bataiye.
Customer: Ha sir free hai aap ki nahi? Subah se aapko time nahi mil pa raha.
Executive: Ha free hu bataiye. O susar susral aaya tha wo susar ne jo hai na hamare admit hai hospital mein.
Customer: Achcha achcha. Kya ho gaya?
Customer: Mamla unka wo mamla aise chal raha ICU mein.
Executive: Wo kya gaya tha sir?
Customer: Wo saans ka problem hai.
Executive: Achcha achcha.
Executive: Abhi to problem sabki aise hi hai. Achcha main bol raha tha ek aapka jo pehle jaise maine bataya tha na ek aapki ticket wo aayi thi concern raise hua tha ki aapne kisi ne matlab saman ke liye aapko paise bheja jaise abhi hai ek.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: A. S. Muradabad ke naam se seller ka naam hai ye.
Customer: Muradabad?
Executive: Matlab aapka hi hai ye. Naam seller ne likhvaya hai.
Customer: Achcha.
Executive: Aur inhone bola hai yaha pe ki ₹2000 advance diye the.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Dispute amount ₹2000 outdoor iron furniture.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Confirm the order to the seller as per agreement. Seller ₹2000 advance and balance was supposed to be paid once goods reach site. Seller started demanding more advance to which have said no cancel the order.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: He agreed to return the advance but till date not received refund and seller is avoiding me.
Executive: Aapka kisi ne complaint likhai hai ki ₹2000 leke bech diya outdoor iron furniture.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Fir aap unse demand kiye the aur advance liye tab hum aapka saman bhijwayenge to unhone aur dale nahi aapne fir refund ke liye mana kar diya fir baad mein refund bhejne ki bol to diya tha but abhi tak dala nahi hai.
Customer: Ye hakikat hai.
Customer: Unhone order kiya tha uske baad mein unki family ne mana kar diya ke humko nahi chahiye to humne bola hai unse.
Customer: Ki sir aapka refund ho jayega.
Customer: Unki family ne mana kiya na ab humko nahi chahiye Diwali beet gayi hai ab humko furniture nahi chahiye.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Clip pick kar rahe hai kya aap?
Executive: Hello. Awaz aa rahi hai sir? Hello.
Customer: Ji. Ji wo aisa hai na unki Diwali nikal gayi hai.
Executive: Achcha achcha.
Customer: To unki family ne discuss kiya tha ke ab humko nahi chahiye aap hamara ₹2000 return kar de. Matlab ₹50000 ke maal mein ₹2000 ka amount pay kiya tha.
Executive: Hmm. Achcha.
Customer: Maal tayar kar liya ab humko nahi chahiye.
Customer: Ab IndiaMART pe complaint kar diya.
Customer: He.
Customer: Ab unse bewakoofon se ye bujho ki agar tumse 25 agar ₹40000 liya hota ya ₹30000 liya hota to fir kya hota?
Executive: Ek aadmi aate.
Customer: Ye hai. Chalo koi nahi kal unse unse bolo bole kal aapko ye ₹2000. Nahi mere paas nahi ye case nahi nahi ye case waise bhi mere paas nahi hai. Ye jo buyer supplier wala case hota hai na ye dusri team dekhti hai. Main to bas aapko sun raha tha.
Customer: Iska number. Nahi nahi ye hakikat hai main jhoot nahi bolta hu. Maine liya ₹2000 mere paas mein hai aur iska number nikal liya mere paas se.
Executive: Ye number kahan se milega iska ab?
Executive: Ab iska number to aapke paas call bhi to aaya hoga dusri team se?
Customer: Nahi nahi koi call bol rahe hai aise maine receive nahi kiya jaldbaji mein chhod deta hu main call laga ke.
Executive: Koi baat nahi agar abki baar aaye to abki baar aayega to le le matlab waha se kar lijiyega. Kyunki aise number mere paas refund hi kar deta hu ho sakta hai main check karunga WhatsApp mein mile kahin na kahin.
Customer: Ab isse yehi puchi jayegi na jo maal hai bhai iska amount kaun pay karega ₹2000 to tu unse le le.
Customer: Lekin ye ₹50000 kaun dene aayega humko? Ab teri complaint hum thane mein kare kahan kare?
Executive: [laughter]
Customer: Nahi iske khilaf bhi to complaint karni padegi na mujhe.
Executive: Sahi baat hai ab aisa hai na aisi complaint se aapka jo account hai us pe dikkat aayegi. Aapka account bar bar.
Customer: Pehle to isse main ye review hatwaunga maine ki pehle isko hata.
Customer: Aur hat hat te hi tere account mein payment aayegi uske baad mein apna mujhe aadhar card de. Pehle aadhar card le lunga uske baad mein iske document pe complaint karunga.
Executive: Ha.
Customer: Maine ₹50000 ka fraud kara maal banwa liya utha nahi raha.
Executive: Bilkul aisa hai na aap kyunki aap aise usne complaint kiya ab uske hisab se kya hai jo bhi buyer isme ye to complaint wala to section mein to dikh hi raha hai na. Aapki visibility isme low karta hai ki aap buyer ko acche se deal nahi kar rahe hai bahut sari. Aur to nahi hai kuch?
Executive: Nahi aur to abhi kuch nahi hai. Maine aapko wo bheja hua hai WhatsApp kar diya maine sir thoda sari details. Aur jisme aapka ek mobile number verify email GST aadhar PAN aur bank ka ek cancel check address proof aur GST certificate photo aur agar udyam certificate hai to ye agar nahi hai to koi baat nahi.
Customer: Achcha to ye to maine ek baar de diya tha aapko.
Executive: Mere ko diya mere ko nahi diya tha shayad aapne pehle jo hai unhe diya hoga but abhi dobara se team mang rahi thi verify pata nahi kya hai. To maine kaha chaliye main ek baar manga leta hu. To aap mere ko WhatsApp hi kar dena main mail kar dunga fir aage.
Customer: Chalo main karta hu. Hai na? Is buyer se baat karo aap kaun hai kya hai wo jo team hai na usse number le lo aur baat karte hai iske sath mein aapko line pe lekar baat kari jayegi. Matlab jab tak ye sir nahi bolenge maine ki jab tak sir nahi bolenge ke review deactivate ho gaya hai tab tak payment nahi jayega. Ye bolenge ke deactivate ho gaya to aapko phone mat cut karna aapke amount mein account mein ₹2000 ka balance poch jayega. Usse pehle kuch nahi ho sakta.
Executive: Actually mere mein unka number show nahi hota aap ek baar agar number mil jaye na aapko to ek baar main baat kar sakta hu kyunki mere mein number aapka hi show ho raha hai aapke naam se ho raha hai.
Customer: Ek baar team se number lijiye. Team se number lijiye complaint team hai usse number nikalwaiye bole is client ka number send karo wo party baat karna chah rahi hai.
Executive: Wo call aapke paas waise hi karega matlab jo team hai na team se call aapke paas aa jayega aaj kal.
Customer: Aate nahi hai mere paas.
Executive: Ab aa jayega kyunki ab mere paas jab matlab ye hai aap complaint dalo aap complaint dalo ki wo mujhe call kare.
Customer: Main karwata hu chaliye.
Executive: Theek hai?
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer has not received refund of ₹2000.

- Another party filed complaint against the customer.

- Customer wants to file a complaint against buyer.



Resolution:

- Executive explained the complaint process.

- Executive asked to share documents for verification.

- Executive asked to contact the buyer.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will share documents on WhatsApp.

- Executive will forward the documents to concerned team.



Alert (If Any):

refund, complaint

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, complaint, documents, verification, buyleads
